name: dummy report
query:
select
sl.warehouse as "DIVISION::200",
sl.item_code as "ERP CODE::200",
i.item_name as "ITEM NAME::300",
i.stock_uom as "UNIT::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "OPENING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 1 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 1::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 2 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 2::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 3 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 3::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 4 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 4::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 5 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 5::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 6 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 6::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 7 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 7::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 8 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 8::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 9 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 9::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 10 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 11::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 11 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 11::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 12 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 11::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 13 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 13::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 14 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 14::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 15 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 15::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 16 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 16::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 17 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 17::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 18 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 18::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 19 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 19::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 20 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 20::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 21 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 21::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 22 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 22::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 23 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 23::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 24 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 24::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 25 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 25::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 26 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 26::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 27 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 27::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 28 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 28::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 29 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 29::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 30 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 30::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and Day(sli.posting_date) = 31 and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Day 31::110",
IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "ISSUED THIS MONTH::200",
IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = 11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 and sli.actual_qty>=0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0) as "PURCHASED THIS MONTH::200",
((IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)-(IFNULL((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0)))+(IFNULL((select sum(sli.actual_qty) from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date) = 11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 and sli.actual_qty>=0 and sli.is_cancelled != 1  order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc ,sli.warehouse desc,sli.creation desc ),0)))as "CLOSING STOCK::200",
IFNULL((select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "value per Pcs/Kg::110",
IFNULL(((select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)=11 and year(sli.posting_date)=2022 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1)-(select sli.qty_after_transaction from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1))*(select sli.valuation_rate from `tabStock Ledger Entry` sli where sli.item_code = sl.item_code and sli.warehouse = sl.warehouse and month(sli.posting_date)< 11 order by sli.posting_date desc, sli.posting_time desc,sli.warehouse,sli.creation desc limit 1),0) as "Month Consumption in birr::110"
from `tabItem` i join `tabStock Ledger Entry` sl
where sl.item_code=i.item_code and sl.item_code LIKE "RM%%" and sl.company="Ethal 2021"
group by sl.warehouse,sl.item_code,i.item_name
order by sl.item_code,sl.creation desc,sl.warehouse desc,sl.posting_date desc, sl.posting_time desc;
